agreeTo: By registering, you agree to our
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
checkEmailToContinue: Please check your email to continue resetting your password
verificationCodeSent: Verification code sent to your email
failedToSendVerificationCode: Failed to send verification code, please try again
emailAddressDoesNotMatch: Email address doesn't match your account email

incorrectCurrentPassword: Current password is incorrect, please try again
enterCurrentAndNewPassword: Enter your current password and a new password

errorDeactivatingAccount: Error deactivating account, please try again
accountDeactivationDescription: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data, and cannot be recovered.
deactivationConsequences: Deactivating your account will result in
profileDeleted: All personal data will be deleted
courseAccessLost: You will lose access to purchased courses
